Homepage.feature2Subtitle: Your data and payments are always protected by industry-leading security.

Footer.description: Premium holiday activity booking platform. Making your travel memories unforgettable.
Footer.newsletterSubtitle: Subscribe to our newsletter for exclusive travel deals and updates.

Dashboard.title: My Bookings
Dashboard.subtitle: Manage your upcoming adventures and travel history.
Dashboard.noBookingsDesc: Start exploring and book your first adventure today!
Dashboard.helpDesc: Our support team is available 24/7 to assist with your bookings.

Database.Traditional Tea Ceremony_desc: Experience the art of the Japanese tea ceremony in a historic teahouse. Learn about matcha, zen, and the etiquette of this ancient ritual.
Database.Mount Batur Sunrise Trek_desc: Hike up the sacred Mount Batur and watch the sunrise over the caldera lake. This active volcano offers stunning views and a memorable adventure.
Database.Luxury Catamaran Cruise_desc: Sail around Santorini in style. Visit the Red and White beaches, swim in the hot springs, and enjoy a delicious BBQ on board.
Database.Moroccan Cooking Class_desc: Visit a local market to buy fresh ingredients, then learn to cook a traditional Tagine and Couscous with a local chef.

Admin.noActivitiesFound: No activities found. Start by creating your first experience!

HowItWorks.title: How it Works
HowItWorks.subtitle: Your dream holiday in three simple steps
HowItWorks.step1Desc: Discover hundreds of unique locations and experiences around the globe.
HowItWorks.step2Desc: Select your preferred date and book safely with our premium payment system.
HowItWorks.step3Desc: Receive your ticket instantly and get ready for an unforgettable journey.
